entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
